Publish date: 2024-06-21

Biography

Eyiyemi Afolayan (born September 11, 2005) is a multi-talented Nigerian personality excelling as an actress, singer, and model.

She was born and raised in a family of artists, with her father being the renowned Nigerian actor Kunle Afolayan. Her upbringing in art and entertainment has undoubtedly influenced her passion and success in these fields.

Early Life & Education

Eyiyemi Afolayan is a young Nigerian actress born in Ilorin, Kwara State on September 11, 2005.

She was raised by her father, Kunle Afolayan, a renowned Nigerian actor and filmmaker, and mother, Tolu Afolayan, along with her three siblings â Diekoloreoluwa David Afolayan, Darasimi Afolayan, and Darimisire Afolayan.

While her school name is unknown to the media, she is known for her intelligence and dedication to her studies. Despite her young age, Eyiyemi Afolayan has already shown great potential and is expected to achieve great things.

Career

Eyiyemi Afolayanâs journey into showbiz was practically written in the stars, thanks to her dadâs influence in the music scene. With a passion for acting and a family connection, she landed her big break in the 2022 film Anikulapo, stepping into the role of Princess Omowunmi. That gig kickstarted her career and put her squarely in the spotlight.

Alongside top-notch talents like Kunle Remi and Bimbo Ademoye, Eyiyemi shared the screen with industry veterans like Taiwo Hassan, Moji Afolayan, Gabriel Afolayan, Layi Wasabi, Niyi Johnson, Titi Kuti, Damilola Ogunsi, earning praise for her performances.

Sheâs also become a familiar face on the runway, strutting her stuff at African Fashion Week and representing the ire clothing brand with style and poise. Plus, Eyiyemi Afolayanâs been the face of lush hair, showcasing her versatility and flair for different looks.

With her magnetic presence and undeniable talent, Eyiyemi Afolayan is set to shine even brighter in both the acting and fashion worlds.

Personal Life

At 18 years old, Eyiyemi Afolayan has already made a name for herself as a talented actress and public figure. While sheâs not married, doesnât have any children, and hasnât spoken publicly about her relationship status or any boyfriend, sheâs kept her personal life private.

Sheâs more focused on her education and blossoming acting career than anything else. As of now, she doesnât have any children to her name.
